AUC

Source: R/auc.R
auc.Rd

Compute the AUC using the Man-Whitney U Test formula.

auc(model, test = NULL, a = NULL)

Arguments

model

SDMmodel or SDMmodelCV object.
test

SWD test locations for SDMmodel objects or logical for SDMmodelCV objects, if not provided it computes the train AUC, default is NULL.
a

SWD absence or background locations used to compute the AUC by the permutation importance function, defaul is NULL.

Value

The value of the AUC.

Details

If the model is a SDMmodelCV object, the function computes the mean of the training or testing AUC values of the different replicates.

Examples

# NOT RUN {
auc(my_model, test = test_dataset)
# }

Contents
